definitions.text: a gathering of persons representative of some larger group
examples: each nation sent a contingent of athletes to the Olympics
the peacekeeping force includes one British contingent

definitions.text: possible but not certain to occur
examples: they had to plan for contingent expenses

definitions.text: determined by conditions or circumstances that follow
examples: arms sales contingent on the approval of congress

definitions.text: uncertain because of uncontrollable circumstances; - George Eliot
examples: the results of confession were not contingent, they were certain
